info.name: NFPA_V2
info.description: This collection focuses on regression testing of NFPA API version 2. You will be able to find test cases covering PUT, POST and GET operations of the API within this collection.

exec: pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Consumer ID is exceeding the maximum field length of 50 characters.");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Product ID is not present in the General Product Agreement Administration");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Agreement start date time is not provided");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Format of the Agreement end dateTime is invalid");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Agreement end dateTime is less than or equal to Agreement start dateTime");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Attribute Name % is not applicable for input Product.");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Mandatory Attribute is not provided for input Product");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Maximum length for Attribute Name : IBAN is invalid");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Agreement ID is already present in the General Product Agreement Administration");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Consumer is not authorized for this operation");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Consumer ID is exceeding the maximum field length of 50 characters.");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Agreement start date time is not provided");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Format of the Agreement end dateTime is invalid");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Agreement end dateTime is less than or equal to Agreement start dateTime");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Attribute Name % is not applicable for input Product.");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Mandatory Attribute is not provided for input Product");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Maximum length for Attribute Name : IBAN is invalid");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Agreement not found in the General Product Agreement Administration");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Consumer is not authorized for this operation");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Consumer ID is exceeding the maximum field length of 50 characters.");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Consumer is not authorized for this operation");
pm.expect(jsonData.errors[0].message).to.eql("Agreement not found in the General Product Agreement Administration");
